comments:
Build id: I20060329-1200
VM: Sun 1.5.0_06-b05

- while debugging, made a code change
- the change apparently did not get propagated to the target for some reason (I have autobuild on, and there was no warning that the target could not be updated)
- set a breakpoint at the place the change was made
- stepped once (F6)
- got an error dialog, and the following in the log:

For some reason, I had the "Show error when hot code replace fails" pref cleared.  I don't recall turning this off.  I've re-enabled it.
Was the code in an inner type?

Found a test case for this in bug 134408.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 134408 ***
